title: How to Make Lobster and Shrimp Chowder in a Slow Cooker

steps.headline: Prepare the slow cooker.
steps.description: Insert your non-stick lining bag or spray the insides with a light and thin layer of non-stick cooking spray.

steps.headline: Add the vegetables and liquids.
steps.description: Combine the potatoes, onion, tomatoes (with liquid), and clam juice into the slow cooker. Sprinkle the tarragon on top.

steps.headline: Set the slow cooker on.
steps.description: Place the slow cooker on high for 3 to 4 hours.

steps.headline: Add the remaining ingredients.
steps.description: Mix in the milk, shrimp, parsley, and lobster in the last 10 to 15 minutes of cooking.

steps.headline: Serve the chowder.
steps.description: Sprinkle salt and pepper, to taste, and serve in individual bowls.

text: Prepare the slow cooker. Insert your non-stick lining bag or spray the insides with a light and thin layer of non-stick cooking spray. Add the vegetables and liquids. Combine the potatoes, onion, tomatoes (with liquid), and clam juice into the slow cooker. Sprinkle the tarragon on top. Set the slow cooker on. Place the slow cooker on high for 3 to 4 hours. Add the remaining ingredients. Mix in the milk, shrimp, parsley, and lobster in the last 10 to 15 minutes of cooking. Serve the chowder. Sprinkle salt and pepper, to taste, and serve in individual bowls.
